column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Cool ramen spot with tall ceilings
column2: nice music and hip atmosphere.  I ordered the tonkotsu black ramen and I thought it was right up there with my favorite ramen in the city.  The egg is served whole and is perfectly cooked.  I requested fresh garlic in my ramen after the bowl had been delivered to the table.  So basically
column3: the waiter let me crush my own garlic with the press
column4: which was pretty cool.  I skipped the appetizers because I'm not keen on any that are typically served at ramen shops.
